title: More Stones, More Stoke? Will Bigger Be Better for the ‘XL’ Strade Bianche?
content:
Face-off: Will the longer, harder courses on tap for 2024 ruin or raise the dirt-road classic? Our editors argue it out.

Read the full article at More Stones, More Stoke? Will Bigger Be Better for the ‘XL’ Strade Bianche? on Velo.
author: Jim Cotton
